text:
Hubert Boulard (21 January 1971 – 12 February 2020) was a French comics writer and colorist. He produced "Miss Pas Touche" in 2006, illustrated by Kerascoët and published by Dargaud, which sold 30,000 as of 2017.
Boulard produced the collective work "Les Gens normaux, paroles lesbiennes gay bi trans", published in 2013, during the time when France was voting on the legalization of gay marriage. In 2019, he wrote the comic "Boiseleur: Les Mains d'Ilian", with illustrations by Gaëlle Hersent.
Boulard died on 12 February 2020 at the age of 49.
